hypothesis: Clonal Ig families may be related to, or influenced by, the  distinct combinations of trafficking receptors expressed on plasmablasts
objectives: To demonstrate the feasibility and utility of the clonal analysis of sorted PB and determine the clonality of distinct TR- defined subsets in 5-10 patient donors. We sorted 4 samples (comprising 100's of PB of each of 3-4 TR subsets and are analyzing the initial antibody repertoires.  As additional sequences become available, we will use bioinformatics to generate phylogenetic trees of the antibody repertoires from each individual and compare the antibody repertoires of plasmablasts with defined distinct TR signatures to the pool of total IgA-PBs within a given patient sample.
